'Enjoy the game and chase your dreams. Dreams do come true'~Sachin Tendulkar.
Cricket – a sport that requires fitness, strength, delicacy of touch, superb reflexes, footwork like a cat, the eye of a hawk, the precision and accuracy of a master jeweller. Cricket, like no other game, takes the whole of a man - his body, soul, heart, will and wits It's not just a sport, it's a religion,it’s a way of life ,it’s a dream- We breathe it, we love it, we live it. Enthusia brings this dream to life. The pitch beckons you, are you ready?
